item.title: Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Portable Ramp Stairs for Couch, Sofa, and High Bed Climbing, Non-Slip Balanced Indoor Step Support, Paw Safe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.99 - $75.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:35:49 UTC – Details)


Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the couch to give you a snuggle. But if your pet is too small or getting older they can’t always jump up and down to do it themselves. And if you’re not always around to help them or you’re getting a bit old yourself, sometimes you need a little extra help. We developed the Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs as a simple, effective way to get them up and down while putting less stress on you both. Featuring a non-slip bottom these fabric-covered stairs in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step sizes simply push right up to the edge so they can climb up or get down quickly, easily, and safely. Product Details: Pet Stairs for Couch, Bed, and Sofa; Supports Small to Medium Dogs and Cats; Heavy-Duty CertiPUR-US Certified Foam; Well-Balanced, Reliable Support for Pets; Lightweight and Portable for Whole Home Use; Soft Fabric Exterior for Paw-Friendly Support; Available in Multiple Colors to Match Home Decor; Help your small dog or aging cat get up on the couch or bed more easily with a soft, supportive foam pet stair system from Best Pet Supplies designed specifically for your four-legged friends. Get one now by clicking Add to Cart above.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 30 x 16 x 22.5 inches; 5.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ST235C-L
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L42MKC3
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam: To ensure that your pet gets the safest quality steps, we made sure that our USA sourced foams are CertiPUR-US Certified. CertiPUR-US Certified foams are manufactured without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.
Reduces Strain on Older Adults – Our versatile dog steps not only help your pets they minimize the need for you to have to pick up your animal to get them up on the furniture, which is especially important if you struggle with strength or stability
Multiple Step Size Options – Ideal for small to medium sized pets these steps for dogs and cats come in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options, so you can use them as dog stairs for beds or pet stairs for cats who need help climbing on a sofa
Trendy Home Decor Colors – We want our dog stairs for high beds and couches to better match your living room, bedroom, or personal space which is why they’re available in 17 different colors and patterns to fit your individual style

Read more

Stability For All Ages

With an anti-slip bottom and 15 or 16 inch width, your dog or cat will climb effortlessly to their favorite spots.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam*

Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foams, these pet stairs are made without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Certificate Issued: September 25, 2018 Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam/CertiPUR-US program.

Cushion Every Step

The mattress-grade foam inside cushions and supports your pet’s every step reducing stress and relieving pressure on their paws and joints.

Easy to Keep Clean

All sizes of steps come with a completely removable cover that is machine washable. All our fabrics are pleasing to the touch and the eyes. With different options to choose from, it will be easy to maintain your household’s good vibes.

Read more

Sizes Available:

– Small: 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L.

– Medium: 15″W x 18″H x 24″L.

– Large: 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L.

Different Heights For Different Spaces

Does your dog need just a little help getting on the couch? Is your cat finding it difficult to reach his favorite window? Give them ultimate access with our 3 ranges of height.

The large is 22 1/2″ inches in height, giving your pet access to taller places within your home. The medium reaches 18″ in height, allowing for a simple climb to reach a snuggle session. The small steps are 13 1/2″ tall, for a simple boost up to a favorite window sill.

  • Our steps are easy to move around your home or take on the go for some adventures. Never worry about your pet’s accessibility anymore, with Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs!

Read more





Dark Grey with White Lattice Print
Brown Linen
Grey Corduroy
Grey Linen
Dark Brown Suede
Paws-Black Fleece

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:31 UTC – Details)

Product Description

All-day Heart Rate Monitoring

The advanced built-in heart rate sensor will continuously measure your heart rate all day (every 5 mins). You can also manually track your real-time heart rate on your watch or intuitively check the heart rate graph in the app.

Fitness Tracker with Multiple Sports Modes

Accurately record all-day activities like steps, calories burned, miles walked, exercise duration. This watch has 9 exercise modes, including running, walking, bicycle, dynamic cycling, hike, climbing, treadmill, Yoga.

You can also activate GPS function of your smart phone and track the routes you have traveled during workout via the app.

Receive Notifications on the Watch

With the watch connected to the app, it will vibrate to notify you when your phone receives incoming calls, text, SNS messages from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc. You can view the messages or decline the calls on the watch directly. Keep you informed in time of anything important. (Please note: not support answer calls or reply message.)

Music Control and Practical Tools

Once the smartwatch is connected to your phone, you can use the watch to control your smart phone’s music (Skip, Play/Pause music).

This sports watch also supports 10 alarm clocks, sedentary reminder, stop watch, timer, breath training, menstrual cycle tracking and other practical tools.

Outstanding Battery Life & Adjustable Brightness Levels

When fully-charged, you can relax and enjoy up to 7 days extra-long battery life or 30 days standby time. This watch has 3 different levels of brightness, so you can choose a suitable level for different surroundings, such as in the sun or at night.

IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch

This smartwatch meets IP68 waterproof standard, which can withstand all your daily activities. You can wear it when wash your hands, run in the rain, or take part in intensive workouts. (Please note: It can’t track your swimming data)

Health Functions

Compatibility
iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices No need App iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices

【Accurate Fitness Tracker with 9 Sport Modes】 This fitness tracker watch can accurately provide 24hrs heart rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring and female cycle tracking. 9 sports modes are optional, including various outdoor and indoor activities, allow you to get the real-time stats during your workouts on the watch. You can also connect it to smartphone’s GPS to track all your workout routes and distance traveled during exercise.
【Smart Watch Compatible with iPhone Android Phones】- This smart watch is compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher smart phones(Not for PC or tablet). Pair the smart watch to your phone and receive all incoming calls, messages, apps notifications straight to your smartwatch including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Whatsapp, and more. (Please note: only supports receiving calls and messages).
【24/7 Heart Rate Monitor & Sleep Tracker】 This smart tracker watch will monitor your heart rate every 5 minutes all day; It also detect and track your sleep, and analyze your sleep quality automatically.(deep sleep, light sleep, and awake time). By connecting the smartwatch to your phone, the app will provide detailed heart rate chart and comprehensive analysis of your sleep quality to help you stay active and stay healthy:)
【Long-lasting battery & IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch】 When fully-charged, this watch can last for up to 7 days or 30 days standby time. With IP68 waterproof, this fitness watch can meet the waterproof requirements of your daily activities such as washing hands or working out in the rain with it. Whether it’s sweat or a small splash, just handle it with ease.
【Smart Watch for Women Men with More Practical Features】 This watch can fit for 6.2-9.2 inch wrist, suits for both women and men. It has many practical features, such as female menstrual cycle tracker, alarm clocks, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder. It’s a also very good choice as gift for your friends and family members to help them stay motivated all day!

GRV

Combining wearable technology with sports & health!

Previous page

  2. GRV is a company that mainly designs and produces wearable technology. Our products are exported to Europe and US. The main products are smart watches, Fitness Activity trackers and wireless earphones. We use the industry’s top technology and design and more scientific and accurate induction algorithms, to bring trustworthy sports and health data to every customer, so that every user can find suitable and trustworthy products in GRV.

  3. Suitable for men and women

    The appearance of the watch is versatile, and it is also very suitable for men with large wrists.

  4. Heart rate monitor

    GRV smart watches use the latest infrared sensors, which can read your heart rate accurately and quickly, and monitor 24 hours a day.

  5. Fashion and beautiful

    GRV’s watch design is very fashionable and beautiful, it is a small accessory for you to match

  6. Activity Tracker

    Accurately record your heart rate, calories and steps to help you understand yourself better

  7. No bluetooth fitness tracker

    This fitness tracker that does not need to be connected to a mobile phone and does not require an app, very easy to use.

  8. True wireless earbuds

    GRV wireless earbuds adopts the latest Bluetooth technology, and the sound quality is clear and stable.

  9. product list

  10. product list

Product Description

Warm Tips:

Please ensure the lamps are switched on before taking them out to gather solar energyBefore you use the spike,you’d better loose up the ground a bit a suitable hole or for the spikePlease make sure the solar panel can get the sunlight directly without any shelter or glass

Specification :

Lamp type: LED

Light Number:8 LED Each Light / 12 PACKS

Power: Built-in battery

Waterproof rating: IP65

Light color: Warm White

Charging time: ≥ 8 hours

Material: Stainless steel and ABS

Working mode: light control + switch

Working time: full charged can be lighting about 8 hours

Product Size(approx.): Diameter 11.5cm/4.53in, total length: 13cm/5.12in

AUTO TURN ON/OFF IP65 WATERPROOF 6-8 WORKING HOURS

WATERPROOF IP65

Equipment with stainless steel material which can be sealed well which is suitable for outdoor. So you don’t need worry about rain, snow, frost etc..

EASY TO INSTALL

Turn on the switch on the back of the disk lights and push the stake into the soil. These solar lights automatically turn on at night and turn off at daytime!

BRIGHTER & EFFICIENT

Turn on automatically when it gets dark, so you’ll always have light for your path, or to make your garden more beautiful and woderful.

Bright Solar Path Lights: Unlike other’s 6 leds, our solar ground lights consist of 8LED lights which means producing more light for your path,600 mAh Ni-MH battery.These Solar lights automatically turn on in darkness or at night and turn off in daytime or bright area.It can illuminate for 6-8 hours within full day charging.(Charging and working time will change depending on the weather)
Easy To Install: Turn on the switch under the cap and push the stake into the soil. These solar path lights automatically turn on at night and turn off at dawn!
High power efficiency,Our ground solar light’s energy conversion rate can be up to 14%.Solar lawn light has passed strict inspection before leaving the factory.
Note: when you receive the package, please put the item in a sunny place for charging all day. The item needs to be charged by solar energy before it can be lit. We guarantee to solve problems for customers within 24 hours and make customers happy! If you have any questions, contact us via Amazon order message. We will provide you with worry-free after-sales service.

Read more

Warm Tips:

  1. Please ensure the lamps are switched on before taking them out to gather solar energy
  2. Before you use the spike,you’d better loose up the ground a bit a suitable hole or for the spike
  3. Please make sure the solar panel can get the sunlight directly without any shelter or glass
